short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Personalize your OTT viewing by skipping unwanted scenes with your preferences and interests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Choice AI to change the future of Entertainment with our cutting-edge AI-powered plugin.

Choice AI personalizes your entertainment experience. Our AI matches your preferences and curates a content you'll actually enjoy. Take control with advanced filtering. Skip entire categories or specific scenes that don't fit your tastes, ensuring a comfortable viewing experience for everyone and even create your owns custom categories to come back again to follow your arcs only. 

Features:

- Skip Specific Tags: Bypass segments with unwanted content.
- Watch Specific Tags: Focus on segments youâ€™re interested in.
- Add Custom Tags: Personalize your viewing by tagging segments.

Your feedback helps us improve! Click on the extension to share your thoughts. We keep your insights private and never share them with third parties.
